duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide support for local tv stations and master control hub with broadcast/news and production systems.
Assist and train operators, troubleshoot hardware and software problems on all Broadcast equipment.
Perform preventative maintenance and installations, updates, and documentation of needed equipment changes.
Respond to on-air technical issues in a live 24/7 production environment with a sense of urgency.
Collaborate with engineering management to identify technical needs, design workflows/systems, and implement solutions.
Follow station, company, and industry standards for installation and documentation of new systems.

education_certification.credential: Associates degree in Electronics or Computer Science, or equivalent training and/or experience.
Comprehensive understanding of production workflows in television.
IT knowledge of computer networking, hardware and software maintenance, and virtual computing platforms is required.
Desire to learn and evaluate new technologies, systems, and workflows.
Understanding of the requirements of a 24/7/365 live news operation.
Willingness and ability to work a flexible schedule to include overnights, weekends, holidays, and on-call in support of a 24x7x365 Broadcast operation.
Ability to travel to remote broadcast sites, as needed.
